name: A Friendly Home for Tiny Terrors
name_original: A Friendly Home for Tiny Terrors
description:
Welcome to the Friendly Home for Tiny Terrors, where orphaned monsters get a fresh start.

Adopt and care for one of three monsters — a suave vampire, an easygoing ghost or a rambunctious werewolf — in this stylish Halloween-themed virtual pet game.

Feed your monster gruesome treats, decorate their home to suit their taste and keep them entertained with a variety of fun minigames.

Help your monster grow up into a truly terrifying terror, then send them out into the wider world to cause mischief and mayhem. Mwahaha!

Features:

- Adorable art!

- Mellifluous music!

- Five different minigames!

- Twelve different monster stories!

- Possibly bugs, this was made for a game jam!

- Love and care!
